scripts.build:js: terser assets/js/admin.js -c -m -o assets/js/admin.min.js --source-map && terser assets/js/public.js -c -m -o assets/js/public.min.js --source-map && terser assets/js/common.js -c -m -o assets/js/common.min.js --source-map && terser assets/js/persist.js -c -m -o assets/js/persist.min.js --source-map
scripts.build:css: cleancss -o assets/css/admin.min.css assets/css/admin.css && cleancss -o assets/css/public.min.css assets/css/public.css && cleancss -o assets/css/common.min.css assets/css/common.css
